ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Deconvolving cell types from high-throughput gene profiling data.
Deconvolving cell types from high-throughput gene profiling data.

name: r-dtangle
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.0.9" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-dtangle
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/dtangle_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/dtangle/dtangle_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c375068c1877c2e8cdc5601cfd5a9c821645c3dff90ddef64817f788f372e179

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-deoptimr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-deoptimr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('dtangle')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('dtangle')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=dtangle
  license: GPL-3
  summary: 'Deconvolving cell types from high-throughput gene profiling data. '
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - huzefaKhalil

# Package: dtangle
# Title: Cell Type Deconvolution from Gene Expressions
# Version: 0.3.1
# Description: Deconvolving cell types from high-throughput gene profiling data.
# Date: 2018-11-09
# Author: Gregory Hunt
# Maintainer: Gregory Hunt <gjhunt@umich.edu>
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.0
# Suggests: knitr, rmarkdown, testthat
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# License: GPL-3
# Depends: R(>= 2.10.0)
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-11-09 14:56:52 UTC; greg
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-11-09 15:20:03 UTC
